title: StraySpot
description: StraySpot is a full-stack web platform designed to streamline animal adoption and shelter management, connecting rescue organizations with potential adopters through a secure, feature-rich system. The application offers advanced pet management, digital adoption workflows, and administrative tools to improve transparency and efficiency in animal welfare operations.
features: Multi-role authentication and secure user management
Advanced pet profile creation and search system

title: DreamCatcher
description: DreamCatcher is an Arduino-powered infant monitoring system integrated with a Node.js web application, providing real-time temperature and motion tracking, historical data visualization, and automated Telegram notifications for caregivers. The project combines hardware sensor data acquisition with a modern web dashboard for enhanced child safety and parental awareness.
features: Real-time temperature and motion monitoring via Arduino sensors
Interactive web dashboard with historical data charts and user profiles
Automated Telegram notifications for critical events

title: Cloaxa
description: Cloaxa is a Chromium browser extension designed to enhance user privacy by routing web traffic through the Tor network, blocking trackers, and providing a kill switch to prevent accidental IP leaks. The extension offers persistent Tor routing, advanced anti-fingerprinting techniques, and an intuitive interface for privacy management.
features: Network kill switch for privacy protection

title: Rust ToDo CLI Tool
description: A robust command-line application for managing personal tasks, featuring full CRUD operations and persistent storage in JSON. The project demonstrates modular Rust design, leveraging Clap for argument parsing and Serde for seamless data serialization, making it an ideal foundation for learning or extending CLI-based productivity tools.
features: Create, read, update, and delete tasks via command-line interface
Persistent task storage using JSON files
Modular architecture with clear separation of concerns

title: DOM Remover Extension
description: A Chrome/Edge browser extension that enables users to save CSS selectors and automatically or instantly remove matching elements from any webpage. It features a popup interface for managing selectors, toggling automatic removal, and importing/exporting selector lists for convenience.
features: Save and manage multiple CSS selectors for element removal
Instantly remove elements or enable automatic removal on page load
Import and export selector lists for sharing and backup

title: Bingo with Text-to-Speech
description: A modern web-based Bingo game featuring 19 different winning patterns and integrated text-to-speech functionality for automated number calling. Built with vanilla JavaScript and neumorphism design principles, offering customizable audio controls and responsive gameplay.
features: 19 unique Bingo patterns including traditional lines, shapes, and creative designs
Text-to-speech integration with voice selection and audio control customization
Neumorphism UI design with responsive layout and toggleable configuration panel
